chapters.title: Chapter 3: Hill of the Golden Dawn
chapters.info: Damer Flinn, p. 92 (106)—Crease-faced old man with a limp, now one of the Dedicated. He is bald with a fringe of white hair around the edge of his head. He was in the Queen's Guards until he took a Murandian lance in the thigh, and ever since has desired to help people with injuries. He came for the amnesty to see if he could learn to Heal; he has since developed methods of Healing that have been forgotten since the Age of Legends.
